The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The sky is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds, and the sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene.

The street itself is lined with lush green trees and shrubs, adding a touch of nature to the urban setting. On the right side of the street, there are orange traffic cones neatly arranged in a row, perhaps indicating some ongoing work or a temporary restriction.

In the distance, a few buildings can be seen, their details slightly blurred due to the distance. Their presence adds a touch of city life to the otherwise natural landscape.

Overall, the image presents a harmonious blend of urban and natural elements, typical of Beijing's cityscape. The precise locations of objects and their relative positions contribute to the depth and perspective of the image. The image does not contain any text or require counting of objects. The description is based solely on the visible content of the image, without any added imagination or aesthetic interpretation.
